meanings.sent1: The basement is a sublevel of the house.
meanings.sent2: The parking garage has multiple sublevels for cars.
meanings.sent3: The sublevel of the building was so deep, it felt like a secret hideout.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the sublevel of the cave felt like delving into a hidden world.
meanings.sent5: The sublevel of the ocean teemed with mysterious creatures.

meanings.definition: A level of energy within an atom.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study the sublevels of atoms to understand their behavior.
meanings.sent2: Electrons occupy specific sublevels within an atom.
meanings.sent3: The sublevel of energy in the atom seemed to dance around playfully.
meanings.sent4: The sublevel of energy within the atom was like a buzzing hive of activity.
meanings.sent5: The sublevel of energy in the atom pulsed with excitement.
